page.title: 02A DAY IN MY LIFE PART 1
page.content: By Sarah Brown aged 8. I wake up at 8 o'clock.It is Sunday.I normally lie in bed for five minutes until my mum can bear it no longer and she shouts at me from downstairs.My little two year old sister is always down there first and my mum has to go down with her.She can't bear having anything broken .For my breakfast I have Coco Pops or Crunchy Nut Cornflakes .I mostly have Coco Pops though.Then we get dressed so we'll be ready for church.I normally wear a pretty dress or a blouse and skirt.We always sit at the back but sometimes we sit in the middle or at the front. We sing a lot of songs,mostly ones we don't know but I still join in with them.Then we have the bread.I will have my communion next Sunday.I always walk on the wall surrounding the flower bed because I am going to be a
